issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Uploaded APK to google play

h3. Actual Result
download say 'Package file was not signed correctly'

h3. Expected Result
Download App
fields.summary: Package file was not signed correctly

comments.body:
There is really not much information provided to troubleshoot the issue. Looking at the number of threads it does not appears to be a Titanium specific problem.

Please look for the accepted answer in the following link and let us know if it solves your problem.

http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/146110/my-app-gives-package-file-was-not-signed-correctly-error-on-google-play-store
